sentences: The AG-13 offered to provide input to the AGBM process on the design of a multilateral consultative process (MCP).

Drawing on its examination of other international environmental agreements compliance procedures, it is likely to contribute to the development of a hybrid mechanism, which might combine assistance with reporting requirements with more stringent compliance monitoring.
AG-13 has been preparing the ground for one of the features that will set the Berlin Mandate process apart from the non-binding nature of the FCCC.
enb_long_title: Second Conference of the Parties to the Framework Convention on Climate Change
